speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, just busy. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I understand, I will be brief. I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with Quick Loans. Can you confirm your name for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Lisa. You currently have a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I need more information before I decide.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! Your last payment was made in January, and your balance has been accumulating since then. Would you like to set up a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: I might consider that. What are the options?

speaker: Agent
text: We can do weekly or monthly payments. For example, a monthly payment of $150 would work for you.

speaker: Customer
text: That sounds reasonable, but I need to think it over.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. Please let me know if you have any questions. Can I count on you to respond by the end of the week?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I'll get back to you. Thank you.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Lisa. Have a great day!
